specs: Richard - with the ability to create a case for a particular jurisdiction within an organisation
created by Richard to create a case - C1 - on behalf of Mario as the applicant which is auto-assigned to Richard's organisation
Matt - with a caseworker-pui role and no Solicitor role
is made by Dil to return the questions that need answering in order to become Mario's representative on C1
contains a valid case ID for C1
contains a valid IDAM token for Dil
to get the update org policy event trigger
to update the applicant org policy
